glsa.title: Squid: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been reported in Squid.

background.p: Squid is a multi-protocol proxy server.

description.p: The Wikimedia Foundation reported a memory leak vulnerability when performing cache updates.

impact.p: A remote attacker could perform numerous specially crafted requests to the vulnerable server, resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Squid users should upgrade to the latest version:
